summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of West 64th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8027 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
